RelatedSentence: ISLAMABAD : Legislators in the Upper House of parliament on Monday said that the country is passing through a critical phase , and efforts are being made to make the state institutions ' repute questionable and divide media .
Speaking on the issue , another PPP senator , Farhatullah Babar said that if any news channel commits a mistake and then offers public apology the issue should be discarded .
